fcdlfsdev2/
├── Raw/
│   └── HydroVu/
│       ├── Incoming/
│       │   └── (incoming files before processing)
│       │       └── HydroVu_Incoming_{timestamp}.parquet
│       │
│       ├── Archive/
│       │   └── Raw_HydroVu_Archive/{YYYYMMDD-THHMMSSZ}.parquet
│       │
│       ├── HV_tracking/
│       │   ├── HVAPITracker{YYYYMMDD-THHMMSSZ}.parquet          # latest / rolling
│       │   └── hv_tracking_archive/
│       │       └── HVAPITracker{YYYYMMDD-THHMMSSZ}.parquet    # archived tracker snapshots
│       │
│       ├── Creds/
│       │   └── HydroVuCreds{YYYYMMDD-THHMMSSZ}.yml            # credentials (sensitive)
│       │
│       └── mWaterFieldNotes/
│           └── MWaterFieldNotes{YYYYMMDD-THHMMSSZ}.parquet   # mWater field notes snapshots
│
└── Curated/
    └── HydroVu/
        ├── AutoQAQCPWQN{YYYYMMDD-THHMMSSZ}.parquet             # latest autoQAQC product
        ├── AutoQAQCPWQNVisualizer{YYYYMMDD-THHMMSSZ}.parquet   # visualizer product
        ├── complete_archive/
        │   └── AutoQAQCPWQN{YYYYMMDD-THHMMSSZ}.parquet       # rolling archive of AutoQAQCPWQN
        ├── visualization_archive/
        │   └── AutoQAQCPWQNVisualizer{YYYYMMDD-THHMMSSZ}.parquet
        └── qaqc_files/
            ├── seasonal_thresholds{YYYYMMDD-THHMMSSZ}.parquet   # seasonal thresholds table
            └── sensor_spec_thresholds{YYYYMMDD-THHMMSSZ}.yml   # sensor spec thresholds (YML)
